channel.title: Hierarchical Data :: Choria Configuration Manager
channel.description: Choria Hierarchical Data Resolver is a small data resolver inspired by Hiera. It evaluates a YAML or JSON document alongside a set of facts to produce a final data map. The resolver supports first and deep merge strategies and relwies on simple string interpolation for hierarchy entries. It is optimized for single files that hold the hierarchy and data rather than the multi-file approach common in Hiera.
